document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Call tomorrow re Maxwell 
Date: Tue, 24 Nov 2020 23:46:29 +0000 
Attachments: 2020.11.24_AJN_order re_meet_&_confer re_MDC_conditions.pdf 
Hi 
In response to the letter we filed yesterday, today Maxwell's counsel filed her own letter demanding that Judge Nathan 
order the Warden of the MDC to appear for a court proceeding to address the defense's complaints about Maxwell's 
conditions of confinement. Judge Nathan endorsed that letter with an order that the parties confer and provide another 
update letter by Tuesday 12/1. Attached is the defense letter with Judge Nathan's endorsement. 
Would you be available tomorrow (11/25) afternoon to discuss, please? Apologies for the late request, but we are hoping 
to address this before the Thanksgiving holiday. 
Thanks very much, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
New Y rk NY 10007 
EFTA00017820
